title: Latest updates: BBC presenter dies from cancer - BBC News

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates for derbyshire and east staffordshire have finished for the day , but we 'll be back at 08:00 tomorrow with all the latest news , sport , travel and weather .

documents.title: east midlands weather update : cloud tonight with scattered showers
text: there 'll be variable amounts of cloud tonight with scattered showers .
in towns and cities , it 's likely to be cooler in rural spots , with a risk of icy patches on untreated routes .
author: Alexandra Hamilton
BBC weather presenter

documents.title: otter 'separated from mum ' in storm doris rescued
text: an otter cub , who was separated from her mother during storm doris , has been rescued by the rspca .
the animal was found `` staggering '' at the side of a river in derbyshire on wednesday night .
the otter , who is called `` daffi '' , is now recovering at an animal hospital in cheshire .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: rams to face blackburn and barnsley
text: derby county face two key fixtures this week as they look to bounce back from saturday 's 1-0 defeat to aston villa .
the rams , who are currently 10 points off the play-off places , have games against blackburn on tuesday and barnsley on saturday .
author: BBC Derby Sport

documents.title: body of burnt dog discovered in burton
text: the body of a burnt dog has been found in a field in burton .
the rspca says the animal was so completely burnt that mainly the skeleton was left visible .
the charity says a passer-by reported the discovery on friday on lynwood road , branston and it 's launched an investigation .
at this stage we do n't know whether the dog was alive or not when the body was set on fire , and due to the body being completely burnt , we do n't even know what type of dog it is . ''
author: Sarah Robertson
Journalist, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: derby students help analyse 'suicide ' case
text: also in the news today
the minister for europe is backing calls for italian authorities to reopen the case of a nottinghamshire woman who died from repeated stab wounds .
claire martin , 31 , was living in italy at the time of her death five years ago .
police there recorded her death as suicide , but now an investigation - helped by students at the university of derby - has cast doubt over how she died .
you can see more on that story in tonight 's inside out east midlands at 19:30 on bbc one .
author: Aleena Naylor
BBC Radio Derby newsreader

documents.title: listen : andy chats with sir cliff richard in 2013
text: and here 's one with andy and sir cliff richard , who spoke from his home in new york .
back in november 2013 , sir cliff was getting ready to release his 100th album .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: listen : andy speaks to piers morgan in 2014
text: here 's an old clip of andy catching up with piers morgan at the 2014 chelsea flower show .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'everyone at college will miss andy '
text: our facebook page has been filled with lots of tributes to andy .
liam elliot wrote : `` everyone at broomfield college will miss andy , especially for his great report he did with their plant centre last year . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: public invited to sign condolence book
text: members of the public are being invited to sign a book of condolence for presenter andy .
it is in bbc radio derby 's reception , which is open weekdays from 09:00 until 17:00 .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'you were always a pleasure to meet '
text: twitter continues to be filled with lots of kind words for andy potter .
@ twitterid such a brilliant tribute show this afternoon for @ twitterid you 'll be so sadly missed andy .
you were always a pleasure to meet .
radio derby presenter andy potter dies from cancer
condolences from derbyshire wildlife trust .
he will be missed .
author: Twitter

documents.title: 'his broadcasting was a pleasure to listen to '
text: jo , from alfreton , has been one of many to get in touch via email today .
she wrote : `` so sorry to hear the sad news about andy , i 've listened to his programme for many years and loved his style .
`` he was a lovely man and his broadcasting was a pleasure to listen to .
`` my condolences to his family and to everyone at bbc radio derby . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: andy 'will be sadly missed by all '
text: on our facebook page , dennis richardson added : `` i had the pleasure of photographing andy when he interviewed emmeline williams last year at the national trust calke abbey .
`` a nicer man you could not wish to meet , will be sadly missed by all , condolences to all his family & friends . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: tune in to andy potter tribute programme
text: just a reminder that we have a special tribute programme on here in memory of andy .
the show consists of andy 's favourite interviews and music .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'a derby lad on a derby radio station '
text: @ twitterid 'a derby lad on a derby radio station ' our thoughts to andy 's family , friends and colleagues .
a truly talented broadcaster .
a great man - wonderful at his job and a champion of the will be sorely missed .
# andypotter
@ twitterid sad to hear about andy potter .
he was a regular at our `` celebrating acheivment '' nights .
his style & enthusiasm was second to none .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: andy was a 'great supporter ' of scouting
text: our thoughts are with andy potters family & @ twitterid at this sad time .
andy was a great supporter of scouting on his programs
author: Twitter

documents.title: 'he was loved by his listeners '
text: stuart thomas , the head of bbc east midlands , has also paid tribute to andy .
terribly sad news - bbc radio derby presenter andy potter died yesterday .
he adored what he did & was loved by his listeners .
this was one of my favourite ever days at work .
glad to have had the chance to work with andy on fun things like this .
sad news indeed my thoughts and respect to his family and friends
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: listen : 'the shock is immense ' , editor says
text: radio derby editor simon cornes has told listeners the shock of andy 's death has been `` immense '' .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'thoughts go to andy 's friends and family '
text: andy was well-known for supporting local theatre and music across the county .
@ twitterid very sad news this morning !
@ twitterid was a great guy !
thoughts to his friends and family
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'a wonderful man who made many happy memories '
text: our facebook page has been inundated with people paying tribute to andy .
emma richardson wrote : `` listened to andy for many years & met him when my daughter was singing at derby cathedral with her school .
he was lovely with the kids & made them all laugh .
wonderful man who made many happy memories for people .
rip andy , you will be missed . ''
georgina smith said : `` such sad news to wake up to .
thoughts go to all his family & friends and his huge extended family at radio derby .
rip andy . ''
sue smith added : `` absolutely heartbreaking .
rip andy and my thoughts are with his family and friends x . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: listen to andy potter tribute programme
text: here 's a reminder that you can follow our special andy potter tribute programme from here .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: andy 'inspired me to pursue radio '
text: @ twitterid andy inspired me to want to pursue radio and now i 'm studying journalism .
who knew harp music could lead to that ?
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: colleague remembers andy
text: here at wembley about to head out @ twitterid for @ twitterid
rip @ twitterid thinking of my @ twitterid colleagues and his family .
author: Twitter

documents.title: listener recalls pub meeting with andy
text: lesley , from belper , has emailed in to tell us the moment she met andy in a pub .
`` we were in our local pub a couple of years ago and there was a couple sat at the table next to us , '' she wrote .
`` they were talking quietly but i recognised one of the voices instantly .
i said to the man , 'excuse me , are you andy potter ? '
'yes ' , he replied .
`` he was a lovely chap - even then the true professional , wanting to know what kinds of things his listeners enjoyed .
i thought he was a great presenter and he will be much missed . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'a first-class broadcaster '
text: radio derby presenter andy potter dies from cancer
so sad - andy was such a nice guy and a 1st class broadcaster - from all your radio family here in kent
radio derby presenter andy potter dies from cancer
so sorry to hear the news of andy 's passing , @ twitterid was always great to see him at donington , our condolences to his family and friends .
author: Twitter

documents.title: listen : the moment andy 's death was announced
text: here is the moment breakfast presenter ian skye told bbc radio derby listeners andy had died over the weekend .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'such an inspirational presenter '
text: terribly sad to hear the news about andy potter such an inspirational presenter our thoughts go out to his family and the team @ twitterid
we are saddened that @ twitterid andy potter has died from cancer .
our condolences to andy 's family and friends at this difficult time .
author: Twitter

documents.title: 'many happy memories of listening to andy '
text: stewart brunyee has also sent us an email about andy .
he wrote : `` just looking at the photos i took when i met andy during his 'canal week ' of programmes in october 2012 .
i went to shardlow at the start and alrewas at the end , and he saw the second meeting as linking his week of broadcasts together .
`` so he put me on air ! !
i am a man of few words but he soon put me at ease .
many happy memories of listening to andy ; he will be missed . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'radio derby has lost a real star '
text: meanwhile , angela harrison has been one of the many to email us this morning .
she said : `` i just want to say how sad i am to hear about andy .
he felt like a friend to me .
`` he had such a lovely manner and radio derby has lost a real star .
my deepest sympathy to his friends and family . ''
if you want to pay tribute or share a memory of andy , get in touch with us via email , facebook or twitter .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: facebook : andy will leave 'huge hole '
text: the tributes for andy continue here are just some from .
our facebook page .
jo james said : `` i 'm so sad .
i always loved working with andy so i know what a huge hole this lovely man will leave in the lives of his family , close friends and colleagues . ''
maureen slack wrote : `` so sad to hear the news .
my thoughts are with all his family , friends and colleagues at radio derby .
a truly special man who left his mark in this world just as he hoped he would .
we are all the better for having known him .
rest in peace andy xxx . ''

nick allen added : `` i took part in a phone in with andy a couple of years ago about the traffic congestion in and around derby due to various roadworks , loved his sense of humour and his free and easy style of interviewing , he will certainly be missed . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: special tribute show for andy
text: from 1pm on @ twitterid there will be a special tribute show to andy potter with his favourite interviews and music
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: brewers and ex-rams player hails 'lovely guy ' andy
text: very sad news this morning .
lovely guy that would always come to say hello every time i popped into radio derby .
# rip
very sad news
i won the @ twitterid dad of the year award and he was hosting the awards evening , such a nice chap .
rip
he was shaun .
top bloke rip
so sorry to hear this shaun .
rip andy x
author: Twitter

documents.title: andy was 'a true professional '
text: our thoughts are with andy 's family and friends as well as everybody at @ twitterid -
sorry to hear this - andy was the master of the @ twitterid radio car !
first met him in a muddy field , where east midlands parkway stn is now !
so sad to hear andy potter has passed away .
he interviewed me about @ twitterid in 2014 .
a true professional and a lovely chap .
@ twitterid
author: Twitter

documents.title: olympian expresses 'shock ' at news
text: shocking news .
thoughts are with andy 's friends and family and the whole @ twitterid team x
author: Twitter

documents.title: tributes pour in for andy potter
text: tributes have been pouring in on our twitter page for andy this morning
many condolences and our very best wishes to all at @ twitterid & of course all of the family & friends of andy potter .
very sad news
lovely tributes on @ twitterid to presenter andy potter who has died .
sympathies from admirers @ twitterid
rip
author: Twitter

documents.title: 'please remember him and simply smile '
text: finally , andy 's family has urged people to `` please take that image of him that you personally have , think about it , think about talking to him , think about the words spoken and please remember him , and just simply smile '' .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'my dad , my granddad and my andy '
text: `` andy is so many different things to so many different people , including radio presenter , friend , interviewer , colleague , journalist , printer , volunteer or one of a thousand others , '' his family said .
`` to us though , he holds the simplest yet most important titles , amongst them all my dad , my granddad and my andy , and we will miss him everyday . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: family hail medics ' 'compassion '
text: the statement continues : `` as a family , we would like to say thank you to all of the staff and volunteers on the nightingale macmillian unit at the royal derby hospital .
`` your compassion shows no boundaries , and we truly thank you . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: andy 's family thank well-wishers
text: the family statement added : `` during the last seven days , as his condition advanced , we have sat by his side '24hrs everyday ' , helping him face what is an evil disease .
`` the messages , cards and mentions of him were passed on to him , every message , comment and 'like ' sent from those that knew him got to him , and from the bottom of our heart , thank you .
`` people 's love for him , the beautiful words and unbelievable kindness that we have witnessed is beyond words and will not be forgotten . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: family : andy showed 'tremendous courage '
text: in a statement , andy 's family has said : `` over the past month since his diagnosis , andy has shown tremendous amounts of courage in tackling his cancer head on .
`` he has taken each day as it came and dealt with everything that has been thrown at him .

`` during this short period , the messages , gifts , cards , and visits that andy has been inundated with from his friends and colleges gave him an idea of the impact he has had on people 's lives and how much he was thought of . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: listen : andy potter speaks of terminal cancer
text: andy spoke of his terminal diagnosis from hospital just a few weeks ago
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'derby man through and through '
text: `` andy was a derby man through and through and a great champion of the city 's arts scene , '' mr cornes added .
`` if there was an event taking place in derby it was a pretty safe bet that andy would be there and a good chance that he 'd be hosting it .
`` our thoughts are with andy 's loved ones at this difficult time . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: andy 'will be deeply missed '
text: simon cornes , bbc radio derby editor , said andy would be `` deeply missed '' .
he said : `` andy is going to be deeply missed by all his friends at radio derby as well as the thousands of listeners who regularly tuned into his programmes .
`` he 's been a big part of the station for many years and it 's hard to imagine the place without him . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: broadcaster announced diagnosis weeks ago
text: andy first joined the station in 1999 and has also been a regular presenter of the saturday breakfast , sunday mid-morning and sunday afternoon shows .
the news follows the death of fellow bbc radio derby .
presenter colin bloomfield .
who died from skin cancer in 2015 .
the broadcaster announced that he had cancer in his bowel , liver and kidneys and only had months to live on radio derby 's breakfast show , on 26 january .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: radio derby presenter dies from cancer
text: we start this morning with some very sad news bbc radio derby presenter andy potter has died weeks after he announced he had been diagnosed with terminal cancer .
the 55-year-old , who had presented the afternoon show since 2010 , died at the royal derby hospital early on sunday .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: join us for today 's live news coverage
text: good morning derbyshire - i hope you 're all well this monday morning .
i 'll be writing the updates on your local live page today .
if you 'd like to get in touch with me you can send an .
email , use .
facebook .
or contact me via .
twitter .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live
